detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Small shoulder bag in glittery imitation leather with embroidery on the front and appliqués at the top. Narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end, a zip at the top and a hanger at one side. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x10.5x15 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide, straight-cut coat in twill made from a viscose blend with a soft brushed finish. Notch lapels, shoulder tabs with a decorative button, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a tab and button. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated velvet with a sheen. Regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.

Shirt in washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Double-layered yoke with a V-shaped seam, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt is partly recycled.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft rib knit. Hat with foldover ribbing and a pompom on top.
Elasticated scrunchies in sheer organza.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Leather ankle boots with partially concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Shorts in soft functional fabric that effectively regulates body heat to help you maintain a comfortable temperature. The shorts have a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and thighs. 80 denier.

Short blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a wide neckline and pleats at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an open back with decorative gathers and ties. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.
Short dress in an airy weave with embroidery. Round neckline, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined.
Outdoor jacket in a rustle weave with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in mesh.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend with narrow notch lapels, and a one-button fastening at the front. Welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a button, buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons at the back of the neck.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Extra-high waist with a wide waist panel and raw-edge hems.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and wide elastic straps at the sides.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Long top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons running diagonally at the top of one shoulder.
Sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Shorts in patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with a wide, elasticated drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, overlocked frilled edges and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly deeper, raw-edge neckline and wide cuffs.
Derby shoes in canvas with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Jumper in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Hole-patterned sections, long sleeves with wide cuffs and decorative buttons, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Handbag in imitation leather with a zip and two adjustable handles at the top.Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 14x27x32 cm.
Short chiffon skirt with a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a gathered flounce that continues around the hem, and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, chunky, patterned jacquard knit. Wide raglan sleeves with narrow, ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Sweatpants in organic cotton jersey with elastication at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, boat-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill around the neckline, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.

Dress in soft velour with a rounded collar, decorative bow at the front, buttons at the back and cap sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping, and a skirt lined with two layers of tulle. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Set with a vest top and shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print on one leg.
Top in a sturdy, ribbed viscose blend with a round, scallop-edged neckline, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a decorative hole pattern and scalloped edge at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit top and woven, flared, lined skirt.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequined embroidery. Gentle V-neck at the back with concealed press-studs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt in a double layer to create volume. Fully lined.
Top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with a text print and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Necklace of thin metal chains with small pendants. Adjustable length 42-48 cm.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Tapered legs with gathers and a zip at the hems.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Metal hoop earrings with fabric tassels at the bottoms. Length approx. 7.5 cm.
Two-button jacket in a herringbone linen and cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel and flared legs.
Double-layered satin top with a V-neck. Longer inner top in chiffon.
Jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip. Zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in patterned stretch cotton satin with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, diagonal side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal bangles in different designs
Fleece sports top with a funnel collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves. Zip at one side and elastication at the back of the hem.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Crinkled blouse in a slightly transparent weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with drawstrings that tie at the cuffs.
City shorts in linen and cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed fastener and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, embroidery on one leg and narrow hems.

Jacket in sturdy twill made from a linen blend with a collar, buttons and a wind flap down the front and open chest and front pockets. Pleats and a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
